questions: The man got out of the car, and then he went into  _  .
The old lady saw  _  in the car.
article:
An old lady went out shopping last Sunday. She came to a bank and saw a car near the door . A man got out of it  and went into the bank . She looked into the car. The keys were in the lock.
The old lady took the keys and followed the man into the bank. The man took a gun out of his pockets and said to the clerk , " Give me all the money . "
But the old lady didn't see this. She went to the man and put the keys in his hand and said, " Young man , you're foolish . Never leave your keys in your car. Someone's going to steal it . "
The man looked at the old woman for a few seconds. Then he looked at the clerk and then he took the keys and ran off the bank, got into his car and drove away quickly without any money .
,.
